Well, it turned out, to the surprise and lack of delight of the company that's passing out the soap, it didn't matter.
Some of the soap had anti-bacterial materials added, you know, these things that they advertise a lot.
And other soap was just plain soap, and that was the only difference between them.
And it didn't matter a bit in terms of preventing infection and preventing problems.
